H0.text: Which Italian explorer had ships named Nina, Pinta and Santa Maria. Amerigo Vespucci

H1.text: Which Italian explorer had ships named Nina, Pinta and Santa Maria. Giovanni da Verrazzano

H2.text: Which Italian explorer had ships named Nina, Pinta and Santa Maria. John Cabot

H3.text: Which Italian explorer had ships named Nina, Pinta and Santa Maria. Columbus's

A4.text: Columbus departed from Palos de la Frontera with three ships: the Santa María, Pinta and the Niña.
